description: This table contains data related to the Wait List contact type. Each record is based on patient contact serial number.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across patients and encounters in your system.

columns.name: WT_LST_TKT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the scheduling ticket which is linked to this wait list entry.
